import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={value:"d-block"};export var sidebarSlice=createSlice({name:"sideBarToggle",initialState:initialState,reducers:{open:function open(state){state.value="d-block";},close:function close(state){state.value="d-none";}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var _sidebarSlice$actions=sidebarSlice.actions,open=_sidebarSlice$actions.open,close=_sidebarSlice$actions.close;export{open,close};export default sidebarSlice.reducer;
